alert.note: Alert for Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 10 at 5:43PM EST until December 11 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield, Southern New Haven, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...Monday morning. * IMPACTS...The combination of elevated water levels and wave action could cause brief minor flooding of vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
